, the singer may join Simon Cowell on the show when it begins filming later this year. "To get her on the show would give it real star power," a source told the magazine. Nicole Scherzinger and Cheryl Cole are also being considered for places on the judging panel, because they've got a proven track record of being great judges, but that doesn't rule Rihanna out. Others who have been rumoured for the show's judging panel include Will Smith , Katy Perry , Mick Jagger and Mariah Carey .

staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals. "The Title X Abortion Provider Prohibition Act would deny any family planning funds under title X from going to Planned Parenthood or other organizations that perform abortions," said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor. It would ensure that abortion providers are not subsidized with federal tax dollars.
